thread.title: An Academic Boycott Is the Wrong Way to Fight Trump
thread.title_full: An Academic Boycott Is the Wrong Way to Fight Trump

author: Cary Nelson
title: An Academic Boycott Is the Wrong Way to Fight Trump
text:
An Academic Boycott Is the Wrong Way to Fight Trump Ellen Shub Mehdi Pirouz, a postdoctoral cancer researcher from Iran studying at Harvard Medical School, protested Donald Trump's ban on immigrants from predominantly Muslim countries on Sunday in Boston's Copley Square. By Cary Nelson January 31, 2017 Premium content for subscribers. Subscribe Today 
L ess than a day after it went online, a petition calling for "an academic boycott of International Conferences held in the U.S." had gathered more than 2,000 signatures from around the world.
